branchCategory.name: ISE40
branchCategory.description: <p>High precision digital pressure switch series 90-ISE40A is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. &nbsp;Abnormal values can be seen at a glance on the 2-color display.&nbsp; The settings of the master pressure switch can be copied to up to 10 slave pressure switches, reducing the setting work, and preventing mistakes in setting.&nbsp; Other features include: simple 3-step setting, analog output, wide variety of piping variations, and a power-saving function for MPa-kPa.&nbsp; The ISE40A is also CE, UL/CSA and RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: 90-ISE40, High Precision Digital Pressure Switch
branchItem.description: <p>High precision digital pressure switch series 90-ISE40A is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. &nbsp;Abnormal values can be seen at a glance on the 2-color display.&nbsp; The settings of the&nbsp;basw pressure switch can be copied to up to 10&nbsp;remote pressure switches, reducing the setting work, and preventing mistakes in setting.&nbsp; Other features include: simple 3-step setting, analog output, wide variety of piping variations, and a power-saving function for MPa-kPa.&nbsp; The ISE40A is also CE, UL/CSA and RoHS compliant.</p>
